name: Gilberto Santa Rosa
description: '''Gilberto Santa Rosa Cortés''' ({{IPA|es|xilˈβeɾto santa ɾosa|pron}}), nicknamed "'''El Caballero de la Salsa'''" (The Gentleman of Salsa) (born August 21, 1962), is a Puerto Rican [[bandleader]] and singer of [[salsa music|salsa]] and [[bolero]]. He is a six-time [[Grammy Award]] winner and has sold over three million records in the United States and [[Puerto Rico]]. Santa Rosa also starred in a comedy.
